name: BMI Calculator
desc: A Django bmi calculator webapp that reads data from a csv file and present the data in the form of graphs

name: Guitar Notes Guessing Game
desc: A guitar notes guessing game webapp built with Django and React. The game generates two random notes and allow the user to guess the number of semitones between them (based on the Western music system).

name: WhatsApp bot
desc: A WhatsApp bot built for collecting patient's health information and schedule weekly reminders as well as generating a pdf report.

name: WhatsApp bot Dashboard
desc: A dashboard that graphycally present the data collected through the WhatApp bot. This is for analyzing and exporting the data into spreadsheets.
